titleStmt.title: Lectiones Cutlerianæ, or, A collection of lectures, physical, mechanical, geographical, & astronomical made before the Royal Society on several occasions at Gresham Colledge : to which are added divers miscellaneous discourses / by Robert Hooke ...
titleStmt.author: Hooke, Robert, 1635-1703.

notesStmt.note: Each part has separate t.p. and pagination, dated 1674-1678.
Reproduction of original in Columbia University Library.
